Class DataBaseIndexPersist

    public class DataBaseIndexPersist
extends curam.core.base.DataBaseIndexPersist
    Batch Process to persist the index for each search service.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Convenience main method allowing the `modelled` batch method.
        Parameters:
        args - none.
        See Also:
        , to be executed from the development environment as if it were the main method of a java application.

      • persistIndex

        public final void persistIndex(java.lang.String searchServiceId)
                        throws AppException,
                               InformationalException
        Persist a specific index. Depends on property to indicate online or `offline` persist. `Offline` persist will use the file system to create the index before copying to DB for performance reasons. OffLine should not be used from inside AppServer container due to usage of the File System.
        Parameters:
        searchServiceId - the search service index identifier.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature

      • persistIndexOnline

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • persistIndex

        public final void persistIndex(SearchServiceKey key)
                        throws AppException,
                               InformationalException
        Persist the index for the specified key. If the key is empty persist all `indices`.
        Parameters:
        key - the search service identifier key.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature

      • setPersistOnLine

        public static void setPersistOnLine(boolean isPersistOnLine)
        Set if persistence is online or off line. Value true indicates persist is online.
        Parameters:
        isPersistOnLine - Is persist onLine.

      • isPersistOnLine

        public static boolean isPersistOnLine()
        Gets the status of persistence. Its either online or off line.
        Returns:
        the status of persistence.
